name: Zero-G Delivery
description:
First, humans walked on the Moon. But when the Lunar New Year came around, those humans had parties to host and invitations to deliver. It is now your job to deliver those invitations to everyone in the Moon, so that you can host the best party the Moon has ever seen!

Race against the clock and yourself as you strive to deliver every invitation as fast as possible. The Moon is fraught with danger, so be sure to dodge hazards and jump precisely! 15 levels of postal platforming await those who want to try their hand at moonwalking.

Controls:

[Keyboard Controls] | (Gamepad Controls*)
*Gamepad controls referred to via the Xbox layout

Level select controls:

ActionKeyboardGamepadNavigate
[W A S D], [Arrow Keys](Control Stick)Select Level[Z](A)

Level play controls:

ActionKeyboardGamepadMovement
[A D],  [Left and Right Arrow Keys](Control Stick) Jump[W], [Up Arrow](Up on Control Stick)
Drop Through Plat[S], [Down Arrow]
(Down on Control Stick)
Interact[Z]
(A)
Throw Envelope
[X], [Space] (B), (RB)Aim Lock
Hold [C]
Hold (X) or (LB)
Pause[Enter](Start)

Tips: You can charge the envelope throws by holding the button, and aim them by holding a direction as you release the button.

Holding the aim lock button will let you aim the envelopes without also moving.

Created by SRPent,  OutOfCharacters, and MQ. (Downloadable version recommended)

This game was made for the Lunar New Year Game Jam. Be sure to give the other entries some love if you liked ours!
